backstories.clan_founder: This rat is one of the founding members of the Mischief.
backstories.clanborn: This rat was born into the Mischief where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} currently {VERB/m_c/reside/resides}.
backstories.halfclan1: This rat was born into the Mischief, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents resides in another Mischief.
backstories.halfclan2: This rat was born in another Mischief, but chose to come to this Mischief to be with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} other parent.
backstories.outsider_roots1: This rat was born into the Mischief, but one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parents is an outsider that belongs to no Mischief.
backstories.outsider_roots2: This rat was born outside the Mischief, but came to live in the Mischief with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent at a young age.
backstories.loner1: This rat joined the Mischief by choice after living life as a loner.
backstories.loner2: This rat used to live in a barn, but mostly stayed away from Twolegs. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} decided Mischief life might be an interesting change of pace.
backstories.loner3: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone.
backstories.loner4: m_c wandered the world, aimless and free, but always alone - until {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found someone worth staying for.
backstories.kittypet1: This rat joined the Mischief by choice after living life with Twolegs as a fancyrat.
backstories.kittypet2: This rat used to live on something called a 'boat' with Twolegs, but decided to join the Mischief.
backstories.kittypet3: This rat used to be a fancyrat. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} got lost after wandering away, and when {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} returned home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs were gone. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Mischief.
backstories.kittypet4: This rat used to be a fancyrat. One day, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} got sick, and {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs brought {PRONOUN/m_c/object} into the belly of a monster. The Twolegs then left {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to fend for {PRONOUN/m_c/self}.
backstories.rogue1: This rat joined the Mischief by choice after living life as a rogue.
backstories.rogue2: This rat used to live in a Twolegplace, scrounging for what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could find. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} thought the Mischief might offer {PRONOUN/m_c/object} more security.
backstories.rogue3: This rat used to live alone in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} own territory, but was chased out by something and eventually found the Mischief.
backstories.abandoned1: This rat was found by the Mischief as a pinkie and has been living with them ever since.
backstories.abandoned2: This rat was born outside of the Mischief, but was brought to the Mischief as a pinkie and has lived here ever since.
backstories.abandoned3: This rat was born into another Mischief, but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/were/was} left here as a pinkie for the Mischief to raise.
backstories.abandoned4: This rat was found and taken in after being abandoned by {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs as a pinkie.
backstories.otherclan1: This rat was born into another Mischief, but came to this Mischief by choice.
backstories.otherclan2: This rat was unhappy in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Mischief and decided to come here instead.
backstories.otherclan3: This rat's Mischief stayed with the Mischief after a disaster struck {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old one, and decided to stay after the rest of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Mischief returned home.
backstories.otherclan4: This rat grew up in another Mischief, but chose to leave that life and join the Mischief {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} now {VERB/m_c/live/lives} in.
backstories.disgraced1: This rat was cast out of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Mischief for some transgression that {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'re/'s} not keen on talking about.
backstories.disgraced2: This rat was exiled from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Mischief for something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didn't do and came here to seek safety.
backstories.disgraced3: This rat once held a high rank in another Mischief but was exiled for reasons {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/refuse/refuses} to share.
backstories.retired_leader: This rat used to be the king of another Mischief before deciding {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} needed a change of scenery after kingship became too much. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} returned {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nine lives and let {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} deputy take over before coming here.
backstories.medicine_cat: This rat was once a medicine rat in another Mischief.
backstories.ostracized_warrior: This rat was ostracized from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old Mischief, but no one really knows why.
backstories.refugee1: This rat came to this Mischief after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former Mischief and the tyrannical king that had taken over.
backstories.refugee2: This rat used to live as a loner, but after another rat chased {PRONOUN/m_c/object} from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} took refuge in the Mischief.
backstories.refugee3: This rat used to be a fancyrat, but joined the Mischief after fleeing from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} cruel Twoleg.
backstories.refugee4: This rat used to be in a rogue group, but joined the Mischief after fleeing from the group's tyrannical king.
backstories.refugee5: This rat got washed away from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} former territory in a flood that destroyed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} home but was glad to find a new home in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new Mischief here.
backstories.refugee6: This rat used to be a fancyrat, but joined the Mischief, sick and weak after eating something {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} shouldn't have.
backstories.tragedy_survivor1: Something horrible happened to this rat's previous Mischief. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} refuse to speak about it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor2: This rat used to be part of a rogue group, but joined the Mischief after something terrible happened to it.
backstories.tragedy_survivor3: This rat used to be a fancyrat, but joined the Mischief after something terrible happened to {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} Twolegs.
backstories.tragedy_survivor4: This rat used to be a loner, but joined the Mischief after something terrible made {PRONOUN/m_c/object} leave {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} old home behind.
backstories.wandering_healer1: This rat used to wander, helping those where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} could, and eventually found the Mischief.
backstories.wandering_healer2: This rat used to live in a specific spot, offering help to all who wandered by, but eventually found {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} way to the Mischief.
backstories.guided1: This rat used to be a fancyrat, but after dreaming of starry-furred rats, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} followed their whispers to the Mischief.
backstories.guided2: This rat used to live a rough life as a rogue. While wandering, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} found a set of starry pawprints, and followed them to the Mischief.
backstories.guided3: This rat used to live as a loner. A starry-furred rat appeared to {PRONOUN/m_c/object} one day, and then led {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to the Mischief.
backstories.guided4: This rat used to live in a different Mischief, until a sign from StarColony told {PRONOUN/m_c/object} to leave.
backstories.orphaned1: This rat was found with a deceased parent. The Mischief took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't hide where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} came from.
backstories.orphaned2: This rat was found with a deceased parent. The Mischief took {PRONOUN/m_c/object} in, but doesn't tell {PRONOUN/m_c/object} where {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} really came from.
backstories.orphaned3: This rat was found as a pinkie among the wreckage of a Monster with no parents in sight and got brought to live in the Mischief.
backstories.orphaned4: This rat was found as a pinkie hiding near a place of battle where there were no survivors and got brought to live in the Mischief.
backstories.orphaned5: This rat was found as a pinkie hiding near {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent's bodies and got brought to live in the Mischief.
backstories.orphaned6: This rat was found flailing in the ocean as a teeny pinkie, no parent in sight.
backstories.outsider1: This rat was born outside of a Mischief.
backstories.outsider2: This rat was born outside of a Mischief, but at {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} birth one parent was a member of a Mischief.
backstories.outsider3: This rat was born outside of a Mischief, while {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} parent was lost.
